description: The variance segment contains the data necessary to describes differences that may have occurred at the time when a healthcare event was documented.

1.name: Variance Instance ID
1.description: This field contains the unique identifier of the specific variance record

2.name: Documented Date/Time
2.description: This field contains the time stamp that identifies the timed occurrence of the variance documentation

3.name: Stated Variance Date/Time
3.description: This field contains the time stamp that identifies a stated time of the variance which may be different than the time it was documented

4.name: Variance Originator
4.description: This field contains the originator (person or system) documenting the variance
4.data_type: XCN - Extended Composite ID Number And Name

5.name: Variance Classification
5.description: This field identifies a categorical set of variances. Classification may be used by applications for presentation and processing functions

6.name: Variance Description
6.description: This field specifies the details of a variance. The content of the field is a string with optional formatting
